comments.content: This happened once in the last week. So it is real but not common. I am assuming this is a nova issue and not tempest. Please reopen if there is evidence to the contrary.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: Honestly, this isn't a bug report, it's a stack trace. Stack traces are easy to come by, but we need something more to make it a bug we're tracking.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
